name: chthonic-archive
description: Bun-native MCP server for repository introspection

tools.name: scan_repository
tools.description: Recursive repository scan (excludes node_modules, .git). Returns file count and first 50 files with sizes.

tools.name: validate_ssot_integrity
tools.description: Verify SSOT (.github/copilot-instructions.md) presence and cryptographic integrity using SHA-256 canonicalization per Section XIV.3

tools.name: query_dependency_graph
tools.description: Query dependency_graph_production.json for file relationships (supports: node, dependencies, dependents, spectral, stats)

tools.name: run_smoke_suite
tools.description: Execute automated validation of all 4 MCP tools + server baseline. Returns structured results (5 validations).
